mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_hand_over_files( id, main_id, name, duty, files_names, original_no, archives_no, certificate_no, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mainId}, #{name}, #{duty}, #{filesNames}, #{originalNo}, #{archivesNo}, #{certificateNo}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_hand_over_files SET main_id = #{mainId}, name = #{name}, duty = #{duty}, files_names = #{filesNames}, original_no = #{originalNo}, archives_no = #{archivesNo}, certificate_no = #{certificateNo}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.main_id AS "mainId", a.name AS "name", a.original_no AS "originalNo" FROM tbl_hand_over_files a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
GROUP BY a.name, a.original_no
